Type Position

Namespace Microsoft.FSharp.Text.Lexing

Interfaces IEquatable<Position>, IStructuralEquatable, IComparable<Position>, IComparable, IStructuralComparable

Position information stored for lexing tokens

Position AsNewLinePos()

int CompareTo(Position obj)

Position EndOfToken(int n)

Given a position at the start of a token of length n, return a position just beyond the end of the token

bool Equals(Position obj)

Position ShiftColumnBy(int by)

Gives a position shifted by specified number of characters

Public static methods

Position FirstLine(string filename)

Get a position corresponding to the first line (line number 1) in a given file

Public properties

int AbsoluteOffset get;

The character number in the input stream

int Char get;

int Column get;

Return the column number marked by the position, i.e. the difference between the AbsoluteOffset and the StartOfLineAbsoluteOffset

Position Empty get;

Get an arbitrary position, with the empty string as filename, and

string FileName get;

The file name associated with the input stream.

int Line get;

The line number in the input stream, assuming fresh positions have been updated using AsNewLinePos() and by modifying the EndPos property of the LexBuffer.

Position NextLine get;

int pos_bol get;

int pos_cnum get;

string pos_fname get;

int pos_lnum get;

int StartOfLineAbsoluteOffset get;

Return absolute offset of the start of the line marked by the position
